name: Jonah Hurl
description:
Check out this funny spin on the Bible story of Jonah and the whale. Try to slingshot Jonah onto shore but watch out for the birds that can throw him off course! Tap on the birds to make them fly away and clear a course for Jonah. Earn points by getting Jonah safely on shore and avoiding the rocks!

See our other games at www.seraphicmedia.net!
